name: Stove Top BBQ Beans
author: Janet Welter
instructions: Fry bacon until crisp, remove from skillet and crumble. Add onion and green pepper to bacon drippings; fry until soft. Add crumbled bacon, pork 'n beans, brown sugar, BBQ sauce and mustard. Bring to a boil on medium heat; cook 15 minutes, stirring occasionally to keep from sticking.
